subdivision_of_building: The proposal is only associated with an existing 2nd floor level roof terrace in which plant is located. This has been shown outlined in red to highlight location on existing site and roof plans.

building_details.building_ref: New Lean-to structure to existing roof mounted plant.

description: Retrospective application for the retention of existing plant and services equipment and installation of a louvre screening structure to cover the existing roof mounted plant deck area.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Reason: In order to comply with Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [230501 100 Rev 1.0, 230501 101 Rev 1.0, 230501 102 Rev 1.0, 230501 103 Rev 1.0, Flood Map for Planning and Planning Letter and Design and Access Information. Received on 21/02/2024; Metal Louvres Manufacturer's Specification and K W High Performance Louvre Product Specification. Received on 07/06/2024; 230501 104 Rev 1.1, 230501 105 Rev 1.1 and Air Quality Assessment. Received on 01/11/2024; 230501 106 Rev 1.1. Received on 04/11/2024; Noise Impact Assessment. Received on 29/11/2024].

Reason: In order to ensure the development is carried out in accordance with the planning permission.

Condition : 3 - Prior commencement of the relevant part of the development, the applicant shall submit to the Local Planning Authority, for approval in writing, details and samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted. The samples/details shall include:

- Cladding (including sections/reveals, manufacturer's details, photographic sample board, colours and panels) and;

- Any other materials/details to be used.

The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the approved details and maintained as such thereafter.

Reason.  In order to protect the appearance of the area thereafter.

Condition : 4 - The cumulative measured or calculated rating level of noise emitted from the mechanical services plant to which this permission refers, shall be 10dB(A) below the existing background noise level at all times that the plant is in operation, following installation of the hereby approved louvre screening structure and noise mitigation measures (acoustic louvre system) within the canopy system. All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS4142: 2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound), +A1:2019 and /or its subsequent amendments. The plant shall be maintained permanently thereafter to continue to meet the standard.

Reason: In order to protect neighbours' living conditions and working conditions for adjoining businesses.
